title: Paris
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Musee du Louvre
description: Episode of Series "A Practical guide to Europe". A practical guide for anyone intending to travel to Paris. Highlights the major cultural attractions, historical districts and shopping precincts. Provides advice on public transport options and locating suitable accommodation. Offers tips on visiting galleries and museums during free or quiet periods. Suggests where to eat and what you should expect to pay. Includes the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, Disneyland, Fountainbleau and Versailles. Presented by John Guerrasio.
related_objects: Series; S01408; A Practical guide to Europe; Active; 1997
